mapper.insert: insert into member(MEMB_ID, MEMB_NAME, MEMB_PW,MEMB_ADDR,MEMB_PHONE_NUMBER, MEMB_EMAIL,MEMB_BIRTH,MEMB_GENDER,MEMB_ENTER_DATE,MEMB_CONFIRM, POST_NUMBER, DETAIL_ADDR) values(#{membId},#{membName},#{membPw},#{membAddr},#{membPhoneNumber}, #{membEmail},#{membBirth},#{membGender},sysdate,#{membConfirm}, #{postNumber},#{detailAddr})
mapper.select: select MEMB_ID membId, MEMB_NAME membName, MEMB_PW membPw, MEMB_ADDR membAddr,MEMB_PHONE_NUMBER membPhoneNumber, MEMB_EMAIL membEmail ,MEMB_BIRTH membBirth, MEMB_GENDER membGender, MEMB_ENTER_DATE membEnterDate ,MEMB_CONFIRM membConfirm, POST_NUMBER postNumber, DETAIL_ADDR detailAddr from member where memb_id = #{memId}
